product_name: Brooks LSD Lite Jacket III - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A packable, weather-resistant and ultralight jacket for your training runs, the men's Brooks Nightlife L.S.D. Lite III jacket is easy to bring along when the weather is unpredictable.
short_description: A packable, weather-resistant and ultralight jacket for your training runs, the men's Brooks Nightlife L.S.D. Lite III jacket is easy to bring along when the weather is unpredictable.
